title: Minecraft Forum 宣布原存档计划取消 网站转交给新公司运营
author: 电量量
txt_content:
本帖最后由 dianliang 于 2019-6-14 20:56 编辑 


原文 标题：A New and Εxciting Beginning链接：https://www.minecraftforum.net/news/60728-a-new-and-еxciting-beginning
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

正文
本译文仅供参考，一切内容请以上文中提供的原始链接中的文本为准。译者与原贴发布者不存在任何形式的联系。

Deciding to close the Minecraft Forum, along with a handful of other community websites, wasn’t an easy decision for our company, but we could no longer justify the substantial engineering resources it took to run the properties. It was a sad day in our office when we announced the sunsetting of many beloved sites.决定关闭 Minecraft Forum 以及其他一些社区网站，对我们公司来说，下达此决定并不容易，但我们无法证明运行这些论坛所需的大量工程资源是合理的。当我们在办公室宣布许多受人喜爱的网站落日时，那真是一个悲痛的日子。
Previously, we weren’t able to entertain selling the sites because they were built on a proprietary platform. It would be a monumental task for an external engineering team to maintain or migrate the communities. Knowing this, we announced the site closures, but just as the sun slowly began to set for these properties, a figure appeared . . .以前，我们不能轻松地把这些网站出售，因为它们是建立在一个专有平台上的。对于外部工程团队来说，维护或迁移社区将是一项艰巨的任务。当我们知晓这基本不可能时，我们最终宣布关闭网站，但正当太阳慢慢地开始为这些网站落下时，一个希望之影出现了...
As of this week, we’ve identified a company with the necessary experience to buy and run these sites (including the Minecraft Forum), so that the passionate communities will continue to have homes on these long-standing sites. With this, we have started to transfer the sites to Magic Find. As for the staff on these sites, it will be up to them and Magic Find to decide how they’d like to move forward.本周，我们已经确定了一家拥有购买和运营这些网站（包括 Minecraft Forum）必要经验的公司，这样的社区将络续在这片极乐净土上拥有新的家园。这就是为什么我们已经开始把网站转移到 Magic Find。接下来将由他们决定如何前进，让 Minecraft Forum 蒸蒸日上。
This isn’t the end for the Minecraft Forum. It’s a new and еxciting beginning. We wish Magic Find the best as we say goodbye to several of the properties that helped our company grow into what it is today.这不是 Minecraft Forum 的落幕。这是一个新的令人振奋的开始。我们衷心希望 Magic Find 会经营好它。因为，这几个将与我们说再见的几个论坛，帮助我们走到了今天。
This will be the last update from Curse/Fandom. All future communications will be from the new site owner.这将是 Curse 或 Fandom 的最后更新。未来的信息将由新的网站所有者发布。
